Subbed Projects.Show Name: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? OVA

Good Comments: Appreciate the effort but you had so many mistranslations. I can live with spelling / grammar mistakes but at least don't make translation mistakes that most veteran anime watchers notice in a glimpse.
Inconsistencies, missed signs/captions, translation errors anyone would notice, and LOTS of spelling and grammar errors. HerpDerp, indeed.
needs improvement. But not a bad attempt
Terrible syntax, grammatical, and written errors. From what I could catch, some lines weren't even translated
Many sentences were quite incoherent and several spelling mistakes were present.
Bad Comments: Bad translation, inconsistent name spellings, awful grammar... need I go on?
Worst subs I've sen in a while. Translator knows no japanese.
Even running the lines through Google translate makes more sense.
It’s like watching CoalGuys and Doki sub together, it’s terrible. It can't be helped.

Terrible grammar, terrible spelling, names were spelled differently throughout the episode, names weren't capitalized, sentences were often not capitalized, syntax was abysmal, lackadaisical interpunction.
Horrible, unforgivable English usage errors used throughout the course of the episode.
